org.omg.CORBA

Interface DynStruct

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DynAny, Object
    Deprecated. 
    Use the new DynStruct instead

    @Deprecated
public interface DynStruct
extends Object, DynAny
    The representation of a DynAny object that is associated with an IDL struct.

    • Method Summary
